data.name: TableSortField
desc: describes how to sort a single field (row/column) in a tables sort descriptor.

items.name: Field
desc: index of the row or column in the table to be sorted; 0-based.

items.name: IsAscending
desc: TRUE if data are sorted in ascending order, FALSE if in descending order.

items.name: IsCaseSensitive
desc: specifies if the case of letters is important when comparing entries.

items.name: FieldType
desc: type of contents in the field.

If the value is com.sun.star.table.TableSortFieldType.AUTOMATIC the algorithm used for sorting is application specific. Especially it may or may not use the values given by \"CollatorLocale\" and \"CollatorAlgorithm\".

items.name: CollatorLocale
desc: the locale used by the collator when comparing/sorting text.
This property will not be used when the \"FieldType\" is com.sun.star.table.TableSortFieldType.NUMERIC

items.name: CollatorAlgorithm
desc: the algorithm used by the collator when comparing/sorting text.
This property will not be used when the \"FieldType\" is com.sun.star.table.TableSortFieldType.NUMERIC
